programme.title: The Magic Of...
programme.desc: Botique travel series focusing on regions

programme.title: A Long Weekend in... With Rory O'Connell
programme.desc: Rory O’Connell’s brand new series combines travel and cookery with the popular chef enjoying the culture as well as the cuisine of eight European cities – Palma de Mallorca, Vienna, Lisbon, Madrid, Bath, Nantes, Copenhagen and Edinburgh. Rory visits a different city in each episode, and while the primary focus is on food, Rory is a knowledgeable guide to so much more, with art and design being particular interests of his. Food becomes much more interesting when seen in context – the culture it is part of the landscape it’s produced in, the history that has influenced it. At the end of each episode, Rory makes a delicious dish with the local produce which he sources on his travels.

programme.title: Discover The World: Indonesia, Nature Of The Earth
programme.desc: One striking feature of Indonesia, even from the air, is the vibrant greenery of Bali, making it resemble an immense golf course that covers the entire island.

programme.title: Discover The World: Malaysia, The Future Between Two Worlds
programme.desc: Malaysia, divided by the South China Sea and nestled between India and China, is the world's most multiracial country.

programme.title: Places To Love
programme.desc: Kentucky is synonymous with Bourbon. At Buffalo Trace Distillery, Samantha talks all things bourbon with third-generation employee Freddie Johnson, including the history of bourbon and how it got named. Visiting the Bernheim Arboretum and Research Forest, Samantha learns how German immigrant Isaac W. Bernheim in 1929 used his fortune from bourbon to buy this land and give it back to the people of Kentucky, and how art has always been an important mission of the Forest.

programme.title: Epic Exploring
programme.desc: Cody together with rooftopper Harry Gallagher undertakes a cable car trip known as 'Stalin’s coffin'.

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Belize: The Hidden Gem of Central America
programme.desc: Feel Belize's unique energy, a blend of rich history, mouthwatering cuisine, and warm hospitality. Dive into its deep-rooted culture and savor culinary traditions intertwined with the nation's past. Belize's natural beauty boasts crystal-clear waters, lush jungles, arguably the world's largest LIVING barrier reef (following the detterioration of Australia's). It's a haven for scuba and snorkeling enthusiasts. Experience Belize's charm and natural wonders!

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Belize: The Hidden Gem of Central America - Part 2
programme.desc: Feel Belize's unique energy, a blend of rich history, mouthwatering cuisine, and warm hospitality. Dive into its deep-rooted culture and savor culinary traditions intertwined with the nation's past. Belize's natural beauty boasts crystal-clear waters, lush jungles, arguably the world's largest LIVING barrier reef (following the detterioration of Australia's). It's a haven for scuba and snorkeling enthusiasts. Experience Belize's charm and natural wonders!

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.desc: Embark on an unforgettable Belizean adventure without breaking the bank! Join us as we explore Belize on a $20,000 budget, discovering incredible experiences, stunning landscapes, and the best that this enchanting destination has to offer. Don't miss out on this affordable adventure!

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Belize: I bought land in Paradise for less than a Toyota Prius!
programme.desc: Belize's magic has captured my heart! After a decade of global exploration, I've chosen Belize as my new home and made my first international real estate investment. In this episode, we uncover the 'why' and 'how' behind this significant decision, from Belize's captivating allure to the ins and outs of foreign real estate. Whether you're an investor eyeing global opportunities or curious about Belize, join us on this exciting journey!

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: How Rwanda's Capital Became an African Success Story
programme.desc: Prepare to be amazed as Rwanda reveals its hidden beauty. From stunning landscapes to a vibrant culture, this country has it all. Rwanda's transformation under visionary leadership is awe-inspiring. The NBA's BAL (Basketball Africa League) recognized its potential and chose Rwanda as the launch site for their billion-dollar league. With a booming infrastructure, low corruption, and breathtaking nature, Rwanda is a true gem. Join us on this journey to explore Rwanda's wonders.

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Colombia: Why are so many Americans moving to this "dangerous country" - Part 1
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling 3-week adventure across Colombia! From Medellín's vibrant streets to the serene beaches of San Andrés, and from the festive vibes of Barranquilla to the mystical beauty of Santa Marta and Tayrona, join us for a roller-coaster of captivating sights and unforeseen twists!

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Colombia: Why are so many Americans moving to this "dangerous country" - Part 2
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling 3-week adventure across Colombia! From Medellín's vibrant streets to the serene beaches of San Andrés, and from the festive vibes of Barranquilla to the mystical beauty of Santa Marta and Tayrona, join us for a roller-coaster of captivating sights and unforeseen twists!

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: A side of Haiti western media refuse to show - Part 1
programme.desc: Haiti is one of the most beautiful countries we have ever visited. Headlines for Haiti are often negative and we won’t be naive to say there are no issues. However, we experienced so much joy and beauty when we visited Cap-Haïtien and the surrounding islands. The history in Haiti is arguably some of the most important to the world today.

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: A side of Haiti western media refuse to show - Part 2
programme.desc: Haiti is one of the most beautiful countries we have ever visited. Headlines for Haiti are often negative and we won’t be naive to say there are no issues. However, we experienced so much joy and beauty when we visited Cap-Haïtien and the surrounding islands. The history in Haiti is arguably some of the most important to the world today.

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Our first time Skiing in Lake Tahoe
programme.desc: The Passport Heavy team heads to Lake Tahoe, a winter wonderland boasting pristine snow-covered landscapes. In this episode, we dive deep into Tahoe's winter charm, strapping on skis and carving through its world-class slopes. Join us as we uncover the magic of a Lake Tahoe winter

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Miami: Champagne Dreams on a Beer Budget!
programme.desc: "The Passport Heavy team embarks on a unique challenge in the heart of glitz and glamor: experiencing Miami's luxury without breaking the bank. In this episode, join us as we navigate the city's upscale hotspots, all while keeping an eye on our budget. Discover how to savor Miami's opulence without the hefty price tag

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.sub-title: Trading Tulum's hype for Isla Mujeres' Authenticity
programme.desc: Isla Mujeres is only a $16, 20-minute boat road from Cancun! If you're planning to go to Cancun anytime soon and don't have this on your itinerary - watch this for every reason why.

programme.title: Passport Heavy
programme.desc: The Passport Heavy team jets off to Tulum, recently crowned one of the top destinations for US travelers, to unravel the hype firsthand. This episode serves as your ultimate travel guide, addressing all your burning questions to ensure your Tulum journey is as seamless and enjoyable as possible. The beauty of Tulum lies in its versatility, catering to both the luxury seeker and the adventure enthusiast. Dive in with us to discover the myriad experiences Tulum offers!
